column4: I have two machines on my network behind a router, a linux box and a windows box.  I would like my wife on her windows box to be able to login to a graphical linux environment hosted from my linux machine and was looking for suggestions on the best way to accomplish this.
I guess you could use vnc like vino on the linux side and some vnc client on windows
vino on ubuntu is installed by default on the windows side you could use http://www.realvnc.com/products/free/4.1/winvncviewer.html
